One 4 Orakei Local Board; if you want to kill people on bikes build a roundabout at Tamaki/Ngapipi: http://www.theguardian.com/cities/2015/oct/19/traffic-lights-roundabouts-way-out …

#yycSE - Blackfoot Tr and 46th Ave - Traffic lights are out. Enmax is on scene. Treat like a 4-way stop, but expect delays. #yyctraffic
